website_summaries.verdict: If you're pregnant or just had your baby, this is an effective cream that’s easy to apply.
pros: Honey scent is pleasant to most
Smooth, non-greasy texture is comfortable to apply and absorbs well
Women report it works best during or just after pregnancy
cons: Won’t help reduce the appearance of stretch marks that have been there for a while

customer_reviews.title: Anyway it smells great and I'll be using it for the next baby ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 8 months of my pregnancy. I ran out and didn't bother rebuying because I didn't have any stretch marks and figured any lotion would work. I got stretch marks when I stopped using it. Maybe coincidence...maybe not lol. Anyway it smells great and I'll be using it for the next baby for sure!
customer_reviews.author: JB550

customer_reviews.title: Good lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture of this lotion. Its light and not the slightest bit greasy. There is no film left on my skin when I use it. I can't say if it helps my stretch marks yet because I have only used it two times so far, but it makes my skin feel nice, so I like it so far. It also has a really pleasant scent as well. I am crossing my fingers I see an improvement in my stretch marks!
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to lotions. I do not like lotions that once you rub it in, it balls up and goes everywhere. This isn't very greasy, soaks in well, and my skin feels super hydrated after. My skin is always really dry and this does the trick. I went ahead and ordered more because it is super good! It smells good but the scent is super light.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a rash...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this lotion but it gave me a rash. I did some trial and error and the only time I see this rash pop up is when I apply this lotion. I only use it on my belly and that’s the only place I break out. I’m sure it doesn’t do that for everyone if any. The lotion itself applies great, isn’t sticky and has a light refreshing scent. I’m sure this lotion would be great for someone who doesn’t have sensitive skin such as myself. If it wasn’t for the rash, I would give it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Berrier

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Great texture and smells nice.. idk if it helps with stretch marks because I’m still on month 6 of my pregnancy so I won’t know if it works until later on.. so far so good, it’s a great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Santos

customer_reviews.title: Love the light scent and non-greasy feel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion for my growing pregnant belly. It was important to me that the lotion I select would not be greasy, and this one definitely is not. It has a nice light scent and dries fairly quickly without the greasy feel. Not sure if it's genes, if I'm lucky, or if it's this lotion, but no stretch marks yet and I'm 35 weeks pregnant. I'd like to attribute some of that to this Bella B tummy honey lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P.A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its my 4th tube and i love the product. only dissapointment is that i go through one tube in a month! my stomach is big with the growing baby, only a size small though, but yea i will end up buying a 100 of those before babies arrival lol
customer_reviews.author: Luiggi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE everything about it but the price for the amount.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many lotions through pregnancy. The smell is great, the texture is awesome. The best part about it, is the anti-itch formula. While I was healing from my pregnancies, this actually faded my marks fantastically! I recommend this - especially for mommies after pregnancy, while you are still healing. I took one star off for the price. Its a bummer to pay so much for such a small amount - especially if you are like me and like to put the lotion on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best belly lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Smells delicious I believe it will help during my itchy phase of my growing belly. Only a month a long so my tummys just started getting itchy. Tried today and it's non greasy and absorbs well into the skin. Smells so good! Will be using the entire pregnancy. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Gypsy Decor

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this with my first pregnancy. I am in my second pregnancy and I use it daily. It's helping diminish the stretch marks from my previos pregnancy and keeping stretch marks at bay with this one. I am very pleased with this product. I hate that it's expensive but it definetly works and it smells so good. Plus I like that its organic and doesn't have all the chemicals like some other stretch mark products. I was hesistant to try with the price but I've been very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LilBear0420

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product smells great and moisturizes; however, it does not work on stretch marks like it claims. This is also a lot of money for a product that doesn’t do as it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: I used this all throughout my pregnancy and I didn't get any stretch marks! I don't know that it was the product's doing or not but I think it definitely helped! It's nice and thick, smells nice and is super moisturizing. After massaging it onto my belly I would even rub the residual lotion onto my hands to keep them moisturized. It really helped with my itching belly!
customer_reviews.author: Leigha Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to this product is that I wish it was bigger than 4oz so I wouldn't have to buy it so often! 😩 But it really helps with my stretch marks, I'm about 8 months pregnant and the smell is not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Cream versus Jelly
customer_reviews.text: I have used Bella B for stretch marks and it has worked amazingly! It does take a few weeks to see results and sometimes it looks a little worse before it gets better. This time when I ordered it, I received a jar of jelly-like cream, rather than the cream in the squeeze bottle. I haven't tried it in this fashion, but I'm hoping for the same results!
customer_reviews.author: mubigoofer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just started using so not sure yet how well this product works. But it smells AMAZING and drys quickly. Leaving my skin feeling soft instead of slimy.
customer_reviews.author: Briana s.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: The scent was weird and my pregnancy smell powers and being very picky. I couldn’t use it long enough to figure out if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: The Galyan Fam

customer_reviews.title: Its working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based mainly on the reviews and the price. I must say that I do see a difference in my stretch marks though. Nothing dramatic. They havent dissapeared over night but they have definitely faded. Ive only been using it once a day for about a month so Im sure if I used it twice a day or more, I would see better results but Im still happy with the difference I see and I will be buying another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The texture is very nice as is the smell
customer_reviews.text: The texture is very nice as is the smell. However as far as fading stretchmarks..I have been using this cream for about 2 weeks now and I see no difference. It's basically an expensive bottle of lotion. I would not recommend this for fading stretchmarks.
customer_reviews.author: the voice

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent, can’t use it.
customer_reviews.text: I have read several reviews that say this has a please try light scent. My experience was completely different. The strong floral scent made it hard for me to breath. Right after applying I tried to wash it off but the scent stayed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing belly cream
customer_reviews.text: I liked this belly cream. It is a good consistency and creamy. It goes on nicely and is not oily. I use it to prevent stretch marks during pregnancy and hopefully its keeping my old ones light from the previous pregnancies. I will keep using this after baby comes too!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on my stomach after a tummy tuck to avoid getting new stretch marks from the newly tightened skin. The smell is mild but pleasant, it feels great and makes my skin feel silky smooth!
customer_reviews.author: William Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice lotion. I put it on daily with a ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 months post partum using lotion on my stomach. Maybe slightly reducing my stretch marks? Its a nice lotion. I put it on daily with a waist cincher. I dont know that it has faded my stretch marks that much but mine are heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: Leighanrose

customer_reviews.title: Second Baby and Picked The Same Product
customer_reviews.text: Second baby and I’m using the same product because it was successful the first time around. I like the lotion for prevention scarring.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Love it, ordering more
customer_reviews.text: Great! Not greasy which is important for dayli use! Moisturings well! I wish though it came in bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Liliia Kolosova

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget your REAR!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this cream for my last pregnancy every night before I went to bed and no stretch marks Whatsoever on my stomach!! Missed my butt though and yes there were claw marks. Here I am again using this Amazing Cream and this time I will Not forget my Rear!!;)
customer_reviews.author: Mordiev

customer_reviews.title: Of all the crap I was recommended to use while pregnant
customer_reviews.text: Of all the crap I was recommended to use while pregnant, of course the thing my boyfriend finds works the best! This stuff is amazing, I've noticed a difference after one use!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hensel

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but not sticky
customer_reviews.text: Although this lotion is quite a bit more than I'd typically spend, it was a lifesaver especially during the times my belly was the most itchy. The typical drug store brands were either too watery and didn't help with the itchiness or they were so thick that they made my skin feel sticky. But the Tummy Honey Cream was a perfect balance.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: When I received this product it had been used by ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product it had been used by someone else. It wasn't sealed it was opened by someone. It was an used product.
customer_reviews.author: Leyda Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to be absorbed. No smell. I still need some time to see the effect though.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Felt and smelled nice but seemed like the product was only packed halfway, if not less. Doesn't feel like 4oz.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: so glad it did
customer_reviews.text: never heard of this brand before, and it happened to pop up as a suggested item. so glad it did. I have bought multiple Bella B prodcuts now and love them all
customer_reviews.author: Ducks_mom

customer_reviews.title: Make a bigger tube please!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I am about 7.5 months preggo and use it in the morning and at night and (knock on wood) no marks so far. I haven't had a problem with itching either. I have been using since about 8 weeks. Early on, the cream lasted for about 3 months. As my stomach has expanded to watermelon status, I'm getting about 1 - 1.5 months out of a tube. I've gone through about 4, am about to finish my 5th and just ordered a 6th one that will hopefully last for the final few months. In addition to my tummy, I've also started putting it on my sides/lower waist and bum.
customer_reviews.author: chocococoa

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see a difference between this product and just using plain coconut oil on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great product! It was shipped and arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It was shipped and arrived on time. I love the thick texture of the cream and it’s not oily or sticky. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Tran

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Within a week of using this product I already see results. I was hesitant about spending a little more than typical for something like this but honestly it is definitely worth it. I place it everywhere on my body and it is showing great results. Im 20, never pregnant, but have some stretch marks (inner thighs, arms, and hips) from old weight issues and this is great. Simply a magic product. But the bottle isnt too big so i suggest ordering 2 in advance :)
customer_reviews.author: Hydie

customer_reviews.title: If  you are sensitive to strong smells, skip this product.
customer_reviews.text: Bella B was my third attempt at stretch mark prevention cream. It smelled better than the other two, but was still very strong smelling and perfumey. I ended up finding Palmer's Cocoa Butter and that works and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Wife used this during her first pregnancy and it worked overall pretty well. The smell isn't fantastic but it's not bad either. I would suggest doing research and seeing what works for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Smelled really nice, 25 weeks and haven't had any stretch marks yet. Will review again after delivery.
customer_reviews.author: heye

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in the beginning of my pregnancy because I already had some stretch marks and most of them faded away within weeks. I am now 5 months pregnant still use this cream daily and no new stretch marks even though my stomach is growing! Purchasing a 2nd bottle very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: 33 weeks pregnant and no stretch marks so far the anti itch is why I love this lotion so much. It's what I run to when my belly gets super itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Cottongim

customer_reviews.title: Good lotion, not great
customer_reviews.text: Loved the smell and the feel, in terms of preventing or even helping current stretch marks - it really had no affect on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any children and I have not gained weight recently. I have always been tall and I have had stretch marks since puberty (I'm 27 now) on my lower back, bottom, and thighs. I apply the cream after each shower, daily. I have had the product since July 19, 2012 and I have seen results. The tube is small, so you should by more than one. It smells nice, it doesn't make your clothes cling to you, and it doesn't rub off onto clothing. I would highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: partially worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I have two areas that have stretch marks. I have been using bella b tummy honey for about 3 weeks. My stretch marks on my chest do not have the shiny look any more. The only way you can see them is if your up close, however, my stomach looks as it did before I started using this product. I will continue to use it because I'm sure it takes longer than 3 weeks to see any results on such a big area. I am still using my first bottle so it does last a while. I would recommend this product based on my experience with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Works great, really helped my stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: This cream works great and really helped to reduce my pregnancy stretch marks. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking to get rid of stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Not seeing a change
customer_reviews.text: I've been usin for 4weeks and am not seeing any change. It smells good and is a nice consistency but I bought to help with fading. Started 3 weeks pp from my first pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Gross

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of time to absorb, but I used this with my first 2 pregnancies, and am now using during my third. I have nary a stretch mark!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Lee

customer_reviews.title: smells great! smooth
customer_reviews.text: smells great! smooth! and I love it, makes my skin feel more flexible and moisture to prevent stretch marks and it also help relieve itchiness when i apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I also use the tummy butter
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I also use the tummy butter. I bought this cream to use during the day when I need to reapply a moisturizer to my stretching belly. It's great. It smells good and feels good. So far, no stretch marks!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: No stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I just had my first baby and no stretch marks to be found. I have even started using it on my breasts as I am nursing and they tend to get very full. Great product would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Livvy W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells fantastic. It feels nice and really hydrates the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M.

customer_reviews.title: Consistency
customer_reviews.text: Consistency is key! This product works as long as you are consistent- and works like a charm! 2-3 times a day and my stretch marks have faded dramatically. I am 8 almost 9 months pregnant and i havent gotten any more stretch marks since I have started using this cream. Its pricey but well worth it. i would recommend buying 2 or 3 tubes since 4 oz goes fast.
customer_reviews.author: PJJohnson

customer_reviews.title: it's okay
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and has a very smooth texture. It definitely goes on easy but as far as stretch mark reduction it didn't work at all and I've used the enter container. Works well as a skin moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy NJ

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancée loves this stuff. After our baby she developed some stretch marks. There was definitely a viable difference after 1 weeks use. This stuff does actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: love it must try
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff I'm on my 7th bottle works wonders
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: They really do fade
customer_reviews.text: I used this product daily and saw a marked improvment in stretch mark visability and even some scares start to fade.
customer_reviews.author: Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product... It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product not only fades stretch mark, it also works as a prevention cream. No stretch marks during my second pregnancy. I wished I had found this product during my first pregnancy. What i love about this product is that it's not oily and it has no aromas, great for folks with morning sickness.
customer_reviews.author: Showmecoffee

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it tells on the package: Fade out the stretch mark! It works on me within only 20 days! I apply twice a day in the last 3 weeks and feel satisfied about the result. I've tried Bio Oil and some other stuff before but this product works the best on me! I love its nature scent also. Going to purchase some more.
customer_reviews.author: Angie1213

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice cream. I'm now almost 5 months and 3 weeks pregnant. I've used it for over 1 month. No stretch marks appears, but I have no idea about this, maybe I haven't been long far in pregnancy. I'm waiting for the result. Only I can say is that it moisturized my belly and I felt so comfortable. Oops! I forgot this: it was very itch when I was in 4-5 months pregnancy. I put this cream on my belly and massaged, and it's better after eacn massage. I'm glade that it got over after 4 weeks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tuv2

customer_reviews.title: Great for the face.
customer_reviews.text: I picked up samples of this product at the doctor's office and tried it on my face. Figured if it would eliminate stretch marks, it might help wrinkles. It's not Retin-A, but it's great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Cherrypie

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I got the honey butter by Bella B before I bought this and even though this product worked fine for me, I wish I would have bought the honey butter again. This just didn't do as great of a job as the honey butter.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: works well, but is a bit too small
customer_reviews.text: I'm not pregnant, but I am a teenager with stretch marks all over my legs from puberty/genes. I bought this a few months ago and applied it once, sometimes twice a day for more than a month and it worked! After a few weeks of application my red stretch marks started to fade until they eventually turned closer and closer to my skin color and the marks faded. Consistency and using the cream twice a day really does help although the bottle is so small, it doesn't last very long when used very often. If it was bigger it would be wonderful, because $15 isn't all that cheap.
customer_reviews.author: ccake

customer_reviews.title: its working!
customer_reviews.text: i have been putting it on since the day i got it i think its the second week and i see improvements! definetely consistency works...only thing i dnt like at all is the price the bottle is half ways full when its sealed!. Sucks and rip off..Great product tho.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I used this to fade my stretch marks, it did fade them for the time being. Only complaint is it doesnt last too long, but it is a great product. Its just too expensive for the short amount of time it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jessithlord

customer_reviews.title: How do you use it?
customer_reviews.text: Hey guys! Do you use this right after shower or can it be used anytime of the day? I just got it and so excited to use it! I'll be back to tell you guys about my experience in a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: BeKindToAllBeings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! Very smooth, mild fragrance. No stretch marks yet! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: minmar

customer_reviews.title: its works at first
customer_reviews.text: i had red stretch marks on my arms and i used it more then twice a day and they lightened up within 2 days and then it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: florence top

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Used it for all of my pregnancies!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Not greasy and super moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Not greasy and super moisturizing. I use it on myself, baby, and toddler.
customer_reviews.author: ODJ

customer_reviews.title: it was okay....
customer_reviews.text: ive ordered this product twice. the first time i used it i didnt notice a big difference in the appearance of my stretch marks. it did leave my skin really smooth and soft so i decided to order the product again and follow the direction. the second time around i notice my stretch marks werent as dark but it really wasnt a big difference i will not be ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: sampi

customer_reviews.title: not that great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for stretch marks on my thighs due to weight gain. I used pretty consistently and have seen no difference. It was recommended to me by a friend and I've been disappointed by it. I dont' know if it would work better on the tummy, but I read that it is ideal for weight gain. I won't buy it again for my thighs.
customer_reviews.author: burtnernie

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: My stretch mark was light, I used the cream twice a day for one month, but it did not work at all for me.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: There was barely enough lotion to last 10 days, but ok as far as a moisturizer goes
customer_reviews.author: erica sudduth

customer_reviews.title: Did not Work...
customer_reviews.text: well i got this like 2 months ago because i got some pretty noticable stretch marks in my back and i applied it everyday once or twice a day but it did not do anything for me. maybe it just works on tummys like it says. i wish i could get my money back or something.
customer_reviews.author: fo0nzy

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: i am in my second trimester and i am using this product. Will let you guys knwo if this really works. Cannot confirm any thing now. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Janak V. Shah

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING at preventing stretch marks!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cream for 3 pregnancies to prevent stretch marks and it has WORKED! Keep in mind that I do have stretch marks from before pregnancy, so I am genetically prone to getting them. But I never got any new marks on my belly. I started this cream as soon as my belly starts to get bigger each time, and used it everyday until delivery.
customer_reviews.author: M H Burns

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this and hope to see some great result and i did
customer_reviews.text: This stretch marks cream is incredible for such cheap price unlike the other stretch marks cream. I purchased this and hope to see some great result and i did. However, during the first few weeks i notice nothing different until i finished using the whole bottle. I am now happy and supprise that this work better than the more expensive stretch marks cream in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching belly
customer_reviews.text: I began using this product during the second trimester of pregnancy. My belly was itchy and a few other products I tried didn’t stop that feeling. Bella B is an awesome product, light scent, absorbs completely, and doesn’t leave a residue on your clothing. The small tube lasted about a month when used only on my belly daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kellye Talley

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily and so far, can’t find stretch marks. Hopefully that’ll be my answer over the next couple of months, until the end of this pregnancy. Baby soft texture and mild pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. I've been using it to help with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I've been using it to help with acne scars. It works well for that. It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave my skin greasy like Earth Momma did (it's also a lot cheaper!). It seems to be helping with scars. The scent is a bit strong (I'm really sensitive to them) and did take some getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: It’s thick but I definitely notice my stretch marks disappearing! Will continue to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Bartow

customer_reviews.title: purchase for baby sister
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews are pretty accurate! thank you fellow shoppers! My sister loves it so far. She says it doesn't make her skin feel greasy or stick to her clothes like other lotions tend to do & it is scented but not too highly scented and overbearing. It is a high price but a decent sized bottle & considering you won't be using it all the time, it is a very good buy. Shipping was incredible as well as customer service. (Sold by: Best Service Stores)
customer_reviews.author: A. Blandov

customer_reviews.title: OK Product, liked the consistency
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was doing good initially and at first kept the creepy crawly stretch marks away, but by month7 it was nothing that could be done. It's just genetics I believe...some people get em, some people dont. I don't think any product can do anything about that, because i used this stuff FAITHFULLY!
customer_reviews.author: Jan'tel C. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate buying this product! You're gonna love it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get enough of this cream! It smells amazing and feels great while lathered on! It doesn't leave any sticky residue & is great for growing bellies! I've used this product along with medermas stretch mark cream and have been stretch mark free for 8 months thus far in my pregnancy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good! Smooth and a good consistency. Not too thick or too thin. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Matzke

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells great
customer_reviews.text: this lotion works. I have been using it for 4.5 months now. My baby is 4m 3wks old. I had very bad stretch marks from this second pregnancy. After using this, it started to fade after 3 weeks. I used Clarins for my first one, and it's not until months to see some improvements. So this lotions works better for me. I don't think my stretch marks will be completely gone, but it now looks more and more like other skin tone. Unless I really pay a lot of attention to it, my tummy looks fab. :) oh and it smells good and light, it's not greasy at all. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Smiley Stars

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. Also it seems to work it doesn't get rid of them but definitely makes my stretch marks appear less red. I use it twice a day and it's also very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: MMB  .4r e e  e.2 MMBmmm7o

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND! !!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! And fast to. I was absolutely amazed at how fast my stretch marks began to fade. Certain spots you can't even tell I had any to begin with! With regular use twice a day you'll get great results. My advice is to buy two bottles at a time so you don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction
customer_reviews.text: Received this product quickly. Read on webMD that this was a good stretch mark cream. I have stretch marks on my belly after having my first son. I did not get big during my pregnancy but my mother has the same stretch marks so I blame genetics. I started using this cream and I have found my red looking stretch marks to have faded. They aren't quite faded completely but I've only been using the cream for about one week. It smells nice too. I suggest ordering two bottles because it's a small container.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Review on smell only thus far
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good on wife. Gotta wait 6 more months before seeing if the effects are as advertised. I shall update.
customer_reviews.author: Edom

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: it helped my the itching a lot. i think its to pricy for a 4oz because of that won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: ANN

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lotion on a daily basis to prevent stretch marks. I really love the honey smell and don't think that it stinks or is offensive. The cream is very thick and you have to really rub it in so your clothes don't stick to you. The only downside is that it doesn't come in a bigger container!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Great product but...
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent, the texture, the ingredients, and just everything about this lotion. It would be the perfect pregnancy product if only it came in a bigger bottle for that price. It may seem like you're getting a good deal, but you'll be surprised how quickly you'll be out of this stuff. It didn't even last me a month...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really love Bella B products and this one is no exception. I used every once of it - if I had the extra money I would have continued to use it, however I was able to find a slightly less alternative and chose to go that route. I love the fact that it's paraben and PEG free!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizhar

customer_reviews.title: ... since I was 2 months pregnant and it works great. It smells nice but it not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: I've used this since I was 2 months pregnant and it works great. It smells nice but it not overpowering. It moisturizes better than some of the other Bella B creams. I'm now 6 months pregnant and still no signs of any stretch marks. Absolutely love this cream.
customer_reviews.author: Shiznakguy

customer_reviews.title: tummy cream
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. As long as you are keeping up with putting it on daily. Leaves your skin feeling super soft. And the smell is really nice. Not too strong. Its really thick lotion, and I would recommend getting 2 bottles even.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: good smell
customer_reviews.text: I already used it for one week. I don't know if it works to stretch mark, maybe I can tell you this after several months, but it really smell good and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: wenying sun

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Helps even after putting tummy honey butter on to help with the dry skin. Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyjox4

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the list of ingredients and it smelled nice but I didn't notice a real difference. My stretch marks are lighter but I was expecting a lot more considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Here's my product review

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It smells really really good, but I didn't really see anything great happen with this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love the smell and how it work. Highly recommend this product! The nipple butter is awesome too. Used them all
customer_reviews.author: Carolin

product_meta.title: BELLA B NATURALS Tummy Honey Cream 4 oz - Bella B Tummy Cream For Stretch Marks - Pregnancy Cream To Prevent Stretch Marks - Stretch Marks Cream For Pregnancy - Pregnancy Stretch Mark Prevention
product_meta.description:
Size:4 Ounce (Pack of 1)FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Tummy Honey Cream includes several key ingredients to fade existing stretch marks, including a unique plant extract clinically proven to fade stretch marks typically between 30 to 50%. It includes anti-itch ingredients to soothe those growing tummies. An emulsion-based formula oil and water that soaks into the skin quickly, it keeps the skin elastic and ultra-moist for several hours. This cream contains no artificial preservatives or parabens, petroleum, or lanolin.
feature_bullets: Ideal for helping fade existing stretch marks, as much as 30-50% or more
Includes Siegesbeckial Orientalis, clinically proven to help fade stretch marks
Winner of the iParenting Award for excellence
Fortified with vitamins C, E and Pro-Vitamin B5
